title: Commands Available:
description:
?ping - prints out "pong!"
?info version - prints out current version of Kreios Bot.
?help - what do you think it does...
?clear NUMBER- deletes the NUMBER of previous msgs in the text channel.
?add NAME_OF_VIDEO - Kreios Bot joins voice channel and plays YouTube video.
?play - plays the next video in the queue
?stop - Kreios Bot leaves the voice channel.
?queue - displays all videos in current queue.
